name: Minimap
description:
Minimap is a level-based combat game. It features unique enemies, bosses, skill points, and simplistic, Don't Starve-style combat, that is hard to master. You have a single type of attack, how well can you use it against the different enemies? You can adjust the difficulty of the game, if it's too easy for you.

Minimap is a game I made during the last 3/2 years, and it's my first game that's actually playable.

MacOS version may or may not work.

You can get it from Google Play Store and the source code is available on GitHub.
